name: MTLCounterResultStatistic
desc: The result from sampling a statistics counter set.

items.name: init(tessellationInputPatches: UInt64, vertexInvocations: UInt64, postTessellationVertexInvocations: UInt64, clipperInvocations: UInt64, clipperPrimitivesOut: UInt64, fragmentInvocations: UInt64, fragmentsPassed: UInt64, computeKernelInvocations: UInt64)
items.desc: Initializes a statistics result with predetermined values.

items.name: var tessellationInputPatches: UInt64
items.desc: The number of tessellation patches passed into the tessellation stage.

items.name: var vertexInvocations: UInt64
items.desc: The number of times vertex shaders were called.

items.name: var postTessellationVertexInvocations: UInt64
items.desc: The number of vertices created by the tessellation stage.

items.name: var clipperInvocations: UInt64
items.desc: The number of primitives sent to the clip stage.

items.name: var clipperPrimitivesOut: UInt64
items.desc: The number of primitives emitted by the clip stage.

items.name: var fragmentInvocations: UInt64
items.desc: The number of times fragment shaders were called.

items.name: var fragmentsPassed: UInt64
items.desc: The number of fragments passed to the visibility and blend stages.

items.name: var computeKernelInvocations: UInt64
items.desc: The number of times compute kernels were called.
